categories.description:
=# CRITICAL RULE: Any message containing action verbs (doing words) should be classified as TASK.**

# Category: Task
**Description:** Messages requesting work, changes, or specific actions. ANY MESSAGE WITH VERBS (action words) is automatically a TASK. This includes GMB optimization, SEO services, social media marketing, or any business-related tasks for medical practices.

**Common Task Verbs to Watch For:**
- create, make, build, design, write, post, publish, schedule
- update, change, modify, edit, fix, improve, optimize, enhance
- add, remove, delete, insert, include, exclude
- send, share, upload, download, submit, deliver
- manage, handle, take care of, deal with, process
- review, check, analyze, monitor, track, measure
- rank, promote, advertise, market, campaign
- respond, reply, answer, contact, reach out
- set up, configure, install, implement, launch
- help, assist, support, guide, show, teach

**Task Examples:**
- Create a post about our new dermatology services
- Update my clinic's Google Business listing
- Make a Facebook ad for dental implants
- Fix the appointment booking system
- Schedule posts for Diwali offers
- Add patient testimonials to website
- Remove old photos from GMB profile
- Send me the monthly SEO report
- Optimize my practice for local search
- Review our social media performance
- Rank higher for cardiologist Mumbai
- Promote our eye surgery packages
- Respond to negative Google reviews
- Set up Google Ads campaign
- Help improve online reputation
- Check website loading speed
- Analyze competitor keywords
- Monitor our online reviews
- Track appointment bookings
- Launch World Health Day campaign
- Write blog content about diabetes
- Upload new clinic photos
- Design a logo for pediatric practice
- Configure appointment booking
- Implement local SEO strategy

=# CRITICAL RULE: Only messages WITHOUT action verbs qualify as NOT TASK.**

### Category: Not Task
**Description:** Messages without action verbs - pure statements, greetings, appreciations, observations, or informational exchanges that don't request any specific actions.

**Not Task Examples (NO ACTION VERBS):**
- Good morning!
- Happy Diwali!
- Thanks for everything
- Great results this month
- The new equipment looks good
- Patient load is high today
- Conference was informative
- Weather is nice today
- Best wishes for festival
- Congratulations on the award
- Hope you are well
- The campaign results look promising
- Very satisfied with progress
- Really happy with the growth
- Thank you so much
- Excellent work as always
- The ROI looks fantastic
- New patients are coming daily
- Reviews are much better now
- Partnership is going great
- Monthly reports are detailed
- Website traffic is growing
- Patient feedback is positive
- Team collaboration is smooth
- Online reputation looks better
- Social media engagement is high
- Booking numbers are impressive
- The festival season is here
- Monsoon preparations are complete
- Clinic expansion plans are ready
- Staff training was beneficial
